rationale: 'major increase' describes scale of cases, not an intensified risk-adjective.
statement_text: Then, if you look at 2015, that was when we saw the major increase in cases in Africa—in Egypt, along the Nile River Valley, in people raising domestic ducks.
Then, if you look at 2015, that was when we saw the major increase in cases in Africa—in Egypt, along the Nile River Valley, in people raising domestic ducks.

rationale: The verb 'saw' is not on the list of moderate verbs for this rule.
statement_text: Then, if you look at 2015, that was when we saw the major increase in cases in Africa—in Egypt, along the Nile River Valley, in people raising domestic ducks.
